title: Bully (Mobile)
headline: Bully (Mobile)
subtitle: Scan the QR Code to Download
content:
Navigate the obstacles of the corrupt and crumbling Bullworth Academy prep school as mischievous teenager Jimmy Hopkins in Bully — now part of the GTA+ Games Library. Stand up to bullies, outsmart the teachers, play pranks, and even engage in some off-campus extracurricular activity in and around the town of Bullworth as you learn to survive the school year — and rule the school.

Scan the QR Code to learn how to play Bully on your mobile device for free as part of your GTA+ Membership.
